                                +--gui.picking.behaviors.PickHighlightBehavior
public class PickHighlightBehavior
extends com.sun.j3d.utils.picking.behaviors.PickMouseBehavior

PickHighlightBehavior provides a picking behavior such that when a mouse such that when you click an object, it will become highlighted. This class is modified specifically for Gizmoball.
